emerging_technologies.name: Agent-Driven Supply Chain Management
emerging_technologies.description: AI agents manage the entire supply chain process, from forecasting demand to inventory management and logistics coordination, reducing human oversight to minimal levels.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increases efficiency and reduces costs but raises concerns about job displacement and the need for new skills training.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires integration with existing supply chain systems, regulatory approval for autonomous decision-making, and trust in AI agent reliability.

emerging_technologies.name: Emotionally Intelligent Agents
emerging_technologies.description: Agents with advanced emotional recognition and response capabilities to provide empathetic interaction with humans.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for improved mental health support and personalized education, but ethical concerns about manipulation and privacy.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Depends on advancements in AI emotional intelligence, public acceptance of AI in sensitive interactions, and regulatory frameworks for emotional data handling.

emerging_technologies.name: Agent-Based Cybersecurity
emerging_technologies.description: AI agents autonomously monitor, detect, and respond to cyber threats in real-time, adapting to new attack patterns.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhanced security but raises concerns about AI agent vulnerabilities and the potential for AI-based cyber warfare.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Rapid adoption driven by increasing cyber threats, but requires standardization of agent protocols and trust in autonomous security systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Full autonomy in personal and commercial vehicles, integrating with smart city infrastructure for optimized traffic flow.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in urban areas, with regulatory frameworks in place for operation and safety.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Personal Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI assistants have become deeply integrated into daily life, managing schedules, finances, and providing personalized content.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Standard in smart homes, devices, and integrated into work environments, with ongoing improvements in natural language processing.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards AI agents managing complex systems with minimal human intervention.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes efficiency but raises ethical and job displacement concerns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, regulations for autonomous systems, and public education on AI interaction.

epoch_themes.description: Development of systems where humans and AI agents work in harmony, enhancing each other's capabilities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improves quality of life and productivity, but requires new social norms for human-agent interactions.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Growing acceptance of AI as collaborators, with emphasis on ethical AI design and human-centric approaches.
